Name: Agronomski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: agriculture, horticulture, agronomy, animal sciences, environmental science
Programs: Agrarna ekonomika, Agroekologija, Animalne znanosti, Biljne znanosti, Ekološka poljoprivreda, Hortikultura, Krajobrazna arhitektura, Poljoprivredna tehnika, Fitomedicina, Mediteranska poljoprivreda
Research topics: molecular characterization, sustainable agriculture, eco-friendly plant protection, soil and water protection, biodiversity conservation, rural development, food quality and safety, Croatian landscapes legislation, wild ornamental species, renewable energy from agriculture
Methods & tech: molecular genetics, sustainable farming practices, ecological modelling, GIS in agriculture, renewable energy systems
Affiliations & labs: agricultural experimental stations, plant breeding centres, soil science labs, animal sciences departments
Typical outputs: scientific papers, crop varieties, agricultural policies, extension services, agrotechnical innovations
Keywords: Agronomski fakultet, agriculture, agronomy, horticulture, sustainable agriculture, animal sciences

Name: Arhitektonski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: architecture, urbanism, design
Programs: Architecture and Urbanism (undergraduate), Design (undergraduate), Architecture and Urbanism (graduate), Design (graduate)
Research topics: building design, urban planning, sustainable architecture, energy-efficient design, heritage conservation, architectural theory
Methods & tech: computer-aided design (CAD), building information modelling (BIM), 3D modelling, sustainable materials, digital fabrication
Affiliations & labs: urban design studios, digital design labs, heritage conservation labs
Typical outputs: architectural projects, urban plans, design prototypes, research articles, competitions
Keywords: architecture, urbanism, design, sustainable architecture, CAD, BIM

Name: Edukacijsko‑rehabilitacijski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: education sciences, rehabilitation, social pedagogy, speech therapy
Programs: Rehabilitacija (undergraduate), Logopedija (undergraduate), Socijalna pedagogija (undergraduate), Edukacijska rehabilitacija (graduate), Logopedija (graduate), Socijalna pedagogija (graduate), specialist and doctoral programmes
Research topics: inclusive education, disability studies, speech-language pathology, behavioural disorders, special education, social pedagogy, mental health
Methods & tech: psychometrics, therapeutic interventions, assistive technologies, inclusive teaching methods
Affiliations & labs: speech and language clinics, rehabilitation centres, early intervention labs
Typical outputs: therapy protocols, educational curricula, research publications, rehabilitation programmes
Keywords: education, rehabilitation, speech therapy, special education, social pedagogy

Name: Ekonomski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: economics, business, management, finance
Programs: Poslovna ekonomija (integrated), Ekonomija (integrated), Bachelor and Master degrees in Business (English), Bachelor and Master degrees in Economics (English), numerous specialist and doctoral programmes
Research topics: macroeconomics, microeconomics, finance, marketing, international economics, tourism, entrepreneurship, public policy
Methods & tech: econometrics, data analysis, statistical modelling, case studies, simulation models
Affiliations & labs: Institute of Economics, research centres, collaboration with business sector, scientific journals (Acta Turistica, ZIREB)
Typical outputs: journal articles, policy papers, business case studies, economic analyses, conferences
Keywords: economics, business, finance, management, marketing, entrepreneurship

Name: Fakultet elektrotehnike i računarstva (UNIZG)
Domain areas: electrical engineering, computer science, information and communication technology, robotics
Programs: BSc Electrical Engineering and Information Technology, BSc Computing, MSc Electrical Engineering and Information Technology with profiles (audiotechnology, power engineering, electronics, electromagnetics), MSc Information and Communication Technology with profiles (automation and robotics, communications and space technologies, information processing, electronics and communications), MSc Computer Science with profiles (computer science, software engineering, data science, computer networks, information security), PhD in Electrical Engineering and Computing
Research topics: machine learning, signal processing, embedded systems, control systems, computer vision, natural language processing, power systems, telecommunications networks, robotics, cybersecurity
Methods & tech: deep learning, optimization, FPGA design, edge computing, high performance computing, 5G/6G networks, robotic platforms, IoT
Affiliations & labs: AITeL (Artificial Intelligence Laboratory), Robotics and Intelligent Systems Lab, Laboratory for Data Science, partnerships with Infobip and Ericsson Nikola Tesla
Typical outputs: IEEE and ACM papers, software tools, patents, spin‑off companies, contributions to standards
Keywords: FER, electrical engineering, computing, ICT, robotics, AI, data science

Name: Fakultet filozofije i religijskih znanosti (UNIZG)
Domain areas: philosophy, religious studies, theology, ethics
Programs: Filozofija (undergraduate), Filozofija i religijske znanosti (undergraduate), Filozofija (graduate), Religijske znanosti (graduate)
Research topics: metaphysics, epistemology, ethics, history of philosophy, phenomenology, religious studies, theology, interreligious dialogue
Methods & tech: hermeneutics, analytic philosophy methods, continental philosophy, textual analysis, comparative religious studies
Affiliations & labs: centres for the philosophy of religion, logic and ethics institutes, theological seminaries
Typical outputs: philosophical monographs, journal articles, translations, conferences, theological commentaries
Keywords: philosophy, religious studies, ethics, theology, metaphysics

Name: Fakultet hrvatskih studija (UNIZG)

Programs: Psychology (undergraduate), Croatology (undergraduate), Communication (undergraduate), History (undergraduate), Sociology (undergraduate), Philosophy and culture (undergraduate), Demography and Croatian diaspora (undergraduate), Psychology (graduate), Croatology (graduate), Communication (graduate), History (graduate), Sociology (graduate), Croatian Latin (graduate), Philosophy (graduate), Teacher education (graduate)
Research topics: Croatian history, linguistics, sociology, demography, diaspora studies, communication and media, philosophy and culture, psychology
Methods & tech: historical-critical methods, sociological surveys, linguistic analysis, demographic analysis, digital humanities methods
Affiliations & labs: centres for Croatian diaspora and migration, cultural institutes, research groups in linguistics and sociology
Typical outputs: books, journal articles, cultural heritage projects, academic conferences, educational materials
Keywords: Croatian studies, croatology, demography, sociology, psychology, history, communication

Name: Fakultet kemijskog inženjerstva i tehnologije (UNIZG)
Domain areas: chemical engineering, materials science, environmental engineering, applied chemistry
Programs: Kemijsko inženjerstvo (undergraduate), Kemija i inženjerstvo materijala (undergraduate), Ekoinženjerstvo (undergraduate), Primijenjena kemija (undergraduate), Kemijsko inženjerstvo (graduate), Kemija i inženjerstvo materijala (graduate), Ekoinženjerstvo (graduate), Primijenjena kemija (graduate), Chemical and Environmental Technology (graduate in English), doctoral programme in Chemical Engineering and Applied Chemistry, specialist programmes in Eco‑engineering, Petroleum‑petrochemical engineering, Corrosion and protection
Research topics: reaction engineering, materials synthesis, corrosion protection, environmental protection, petrochemical processes, process safety, nanotechnology, polymers
Methods & tech: chemical process simulation, laboratory reactors, materials characterization (SEM, XRD), corrosion testing, environmental monitoring, catalysis techniques

Typical outputs: scientific articles, industrial process improvements, new materials, patents, environmental technologies
Keywords: chemical engineering, materials science, eco‑engineering, applied chemistry, corrosion

Name: Fakultet političkih znanosti (UNIZG)
Domain areas: political science, journalism, public policy, international relations, communication
Programs: Political Science (undergraduate), Journalism (undergraduate), Political Science (graduate), Journalism (graduate), European Studies (master), specialist programmes: Local democracy and development, Public relations, Regional comparative studies, Security policy, Foreign policy and diplomacy, Project management for EU funds, doctoral programme in Political science and comparative politics
Research topics: comparative politics, public policy analysis, media and communication studies, international relations, Croatian politics, security studies, political theory, strategic communication
Methods & tech: quantitative and qualitative research, political surveys, media analysis, data journalism, comparative studies
Affiliations & labs: departments of Croatian Politics, Media and Communication, Comparative Politics, Public Policy and Management, International Relations and Security Studies, Political and Social Theory, Foreign Languages and Education, Strategic Communication, Journalism and Media Production
Typical outputs: policy analyses, academic journals, research reports, news articles, communication campaigns, conferences

Name: Fakultet prometnih znanosti (UNIZG)

Programs: Traffic and Transport (undergraduate and graduate) with courses in Road, Railway, Urban, Air, Waterway, Postal, Information and Communication Transport and Traffic; Intelligent Transport Systems and Logistics (undergraduate and graduate); Aeronautics (undergraduate and graduate); specialist and doctoral studies in Urban Transport and Traffic, Inter‑modal Transport and Traffic, Transport Logistics and Management
Research topics: intelligent transport systems, traffic safety, logistics, aviation operations, urban mobility, intermodal transport, transport modelling, sustainable mobility
Methods & tech: transport simulation, traffic flow modelling, GIS and remote sensing, safety analysis, navigation systems, logistics optimisation
Affiliations & labs: traffic engineering laboratories, logistics centre, flight training facility, collaborations with transport agencies and industry
Typical outputs: traffic studies, safety guidelines, logistics models, research publications, patents, transport policies

Name: Fakultet strojarstva i brodogradnje (UNIZG)
Domain areas: mechanical engineering, naval architecture, aerospace, robotics, energy systems
Programs: Mechanical Engineering (undergraduate, 3 years), Mechanical Engineering (graduate, 2 years) with specializations: Design engineering, Engines and vehicles, Mechanisms and robotics, Energy engineering, Process engineering, Manufacturing engineering, Industrial engineering, Aerospace engineering, Mechatronics; doctoral studies
Research topics: robotics, automation, energy systems, thermodynamics, biomechanics, fluid mechanics, materials engineering, naval architecture, manufacturing processes
Methods & tech: CAD/CAM, finite element analysis (FEA), robotics systems, additive manufacturing, computational fluid dynamics, control systems, material testing

Name: Fakultet šumarstva i drvne tehnologije (UNIZG)
Domain areas: forestry, wood technology, urban forestry, nature conservation
Programs: Forestry (undergraduate), Urban Forestry/Nature Conservation (undergraduate), Wood Technology (undergraduate), Forestry (graduate) – silviculture and wildlife management; techniques/technologies/management in forestry; urban forestry & nature conservation; Wood Technology (graduate) – processes and design; doctoral and specialist studies
Research topics: silviculture, forest ecology, forest management, wood science, dendrology, forest genetics, biodiversity conservation, timber harvesting, furniture design
Methods & tech: dendrochronology, GIS and remote sensing, wood machining, material testing, ecological modelling, forest inventory techniques
Affiliations & labs: Institute for Ecology, Silviculture Institute, Forest Genetics and Dendrology labs, Forest Protection Institute, Wood Science and Materials Technology labs, Process Engineering labs, demonstration forests
Typical outputs: forest management plans, wood products, research papers, environmental impact assessments, tree breeding programmes, timber innovations

Name: Farmaceutsko‑biokemijski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: pharmacy, biochemistry, pharmaceutical sciences, health sciences
Programs: Integrated Pharmacy programme (5 years, 300 ECTS) leading to Master of Pharmacy, with elective courses and research opportunities
Research topics: drug discovery, pharmaceutical analysis, pharmacology, medicinal chemistry, toxicology, clinical pharmacy, pharmacokinetics, biotechnology
Methods & tech: chromatography, spectroscopy, molecular biology techniques, medicinal chemistry synthesis, pharmacokinetic modelling, pharmaceutical manufacturing, quality control systems
Affiliations & labs: pharmaceutical chemistry labs, clinical pharmacy labs, biotechnology research groups, collaborations with hospitals and pharmaceutical companies
Typical outputs: drug formulations, patents, research articles, pharmacopoeias, guidelines, innovative therapies

Name: Filozofski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: humanities, social sciences, linguistics, philosophy, psychology, sociology
Programs: 45 undergraduate programmes (36 double‑major, 9 single‑major), 51 graduate programmes (16 single‑major, 35 double‑major) including programs in linguistics, philosophy, history, archaeology, art history, psychology, sociology, anthropology, information sciences, translation studies, digital linguistics, clinical linguistics and phonetics, applied cognitive science
Research topics: linguistics, literary studies, philosophy, history, archaeology, art history, anthropology, sociology, psychology, information science, translation studies, digital humanities, cognitive science

Name: Geodetski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: geodesy, geomatics engineering, geoinformatics, surveying
Programs: Geodesy and Geoinformatics (undergraduate), Geodesy (graduate), Geoinformatics (graduate), doctoral and specialist programmes
Research topics: satellite geodesy, photogrammetry, remote sensing, geoinformation science, cartography, hydrography, engineering geodesy, GNSS, spatial information management, land surveying
Methods & tech: GNSS positioning, photogrammetric processing, laser scanning, geospatial data analysis, remote sensing, GIS modelling, geoid determination
Affiliations & labs: departments including State Survey, Geoinformation Science, Hydrography, Mathematics & Physics, Analysis and Processing of Geodetic Measurements, Satellite Geodesy, Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, Geoinformation, Cartography, Instrumental Technology, Engineering Geodesy, Organization and Management Theory, Spatial Information Management, Land Surveying, Hvar Observatory
Typical outputs: geospatial datasets, maps, geoid models, software tools, scientific articles, contributions to national geodetic networks

Name: Građevinski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: civil engineering, structural engineering, geotechnics, hydrotechnics, transportation engineering
Programs: Civil Engineering (undergraduate, 3 years, 180 ECTS); Civil Engineering (graduate, 2 years, 120 ECTS) with specializations in geotechnics, hydrotechnics, structural engineering, materials, construction management, transportation engineering, structural theory & modelling; doctoral and specialist programmes
Research topics: structural analysis, geotechnical engineering, hydrology, infrastructure design, materials science, earthquake engineering, transportation systems, sustainability in construction
Methods & tech: finite element analysis, geotechnical testing, hydrodynamic simulations, building information modelling (BIM), materials testing, surveying, structural health monitoring
Affiliations & labs: laboratories for geotechnical engineering, structural testing, hydraulics, materials, transportation engineering; research centres for sustainable construction and earthquake engineering

Name: Grafički fakultet (UNIZG)

Programs: Technical‑technological (undergraduate, 6 semesters), Design of graphic arts products (undergraduate, 6 semesters), Graphic Engineering (graduate, 4 semesters), Design of Graphic Products (graduate, 4 semesters), Doctoral study in Graphic Engineering (6 semesters)
Research topics: visual communications and media, multimedia, digital media, graphic design, photography, publishing, marketing, prepress, press, postpress, printing, packaging, colour management, graphic materials, ecology, crossmedia, 3D modelling and printing
Methods & tech: digital printing, colour management, 3D modelling and printing, cross‑media production, image processing, packaging design, photographic techniques, quality control
Affiliations & labs: departments of fundamental knowledge, graphic design and imaging, computer graphics and multimedia, printing processes, bookbinding and packaging, printing materials and printing form; laboratories for colour management and digital printing; conferences such as Blaž Baromić
Typical outputs: graphic products, packaging, digital media, design prototypes, research articles, conference proceedings

Name: Katolički bogoslovni fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: theology, religious education, philosophy, church music
Programs: Integrated philosophical‑theological programme (5 years), Theological‑religious sciences (undergraduate, 3 years), Theological‑religious sciences (graduate, 2 years), Church music (undergraduate and graduate)
Research topics: theology, biblical studies, pastoral studies, ethics, church music, liturgy, philosophy of religion, religious education

Name: Kineziološki fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: kinesiology, sports science, physical education, exercise science
Programs: Integrated Kinesiology programme (5 years, 10 semesters, 300 ECTS) with specializations: Athletics, Fitness, Wrestling, Sailing, Windsurfing, Judo, Kayaking, Recreation, Kinesiotherapy, Conditioning training, Basketball, Football, Volleyball, Basic Kinesiological Transformation, Dance, Swimming, Rhythmic gymnastics, Handball, Skiing, Gymnastics, Sports Management, Tennis, Rowing; Doctoral study in Kinesiology (3 years, 180 ECTS); Professional study 'Izobrazba trenera' (Trainer Education) (3 years, 180 ECTS) with specialized graduate programme
Research topics: sports training, motor learning, sports medicine, biomechanics, exercise physiology, kinesiology in education, coaching science, physical fitness, kinesiotherapy
Methods & tech: performance analysis, biomechanical measurement, physiological testing, coaching techniques, sports analytics, movement analysis, rehabilitation exercises

Name: Medicinski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: medicine, health sciences, biomedical sciences
Programs: Integrated study of Medicine (6 years, 12 semesters) awarding Doctor of Medicine; includes general courses and four groups of mandatory professional courses: basic medicine, pre‑clinical medicine, clinical medicine, public health; extensive practical teaching
Research topics: biomedical research, clinical studies, public health, epidemiology, genetics, pharmacology, surgery, internal medicine, neuroscience, immunology
Methods & tech: laboratory research, clinical trials, imaging technologies (MRI, CT), surgery, diagnostics, biomedical informatics, simulation training, molecular biology techniques
Affiliations & labs: university hospital centres, research institutes, clinical departments (surgery, internal medicine, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynaecology, neurology, oncology), teaching hospitals
Typical outputs: scientific publications, clinical guidelines, healthcare innovations, medical curricula, patents, therapies
Keywords: medicine, medical education, clinical practice, public health, biomedical research, health sciences

Name: Metalurški fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: metallurgy, materials science, industrial ecology
Programs: Metalurško inženjerstvo (undergraduate, 3 years, 180 ECTS), Industrijska ekologija (undergraduate, 3 years, 180 ECTS), graduate and doctoral programmes in metallurgy and materials engineering
Research topics: metal production, steelmaking, casting, materials processing, powder metallurgy, recycling, environmental protection in metallurgy, nanostructured materials, industrial ecology
Methods & tech: metallurgical processes, heat treatment, mechanical testing, materials characterization (SEM, XRD), environmental monitoring, thermo‑chemical modelling
Affiliations & labs: metallurgy labs, foundry, corrosion laboratory, materials testing centre, partnerships with steel and metal industries
Typical outputs: new alloys, metallurgical process innovations, research articles, patents, environmental mitigation technologies
Keywords: metallurgy, materials science, industrial ecology, metal processing, recycling, steelmaking

Name: Pravni fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: law, legal studies, social work, public administration
Programs: Integrated study of Law (5 years), Social Work (undergraduate), Social Work/Social Policy (graduate), Public Administration (undergraduate), Tax study (undergraduate), Specialist graduate study in Public Administration, postgraduate programmes in civil law, commercial law, international law, criminal sciences, fiscal system, public law and administration, European law, social work, social policy
Research topics: civil law, criminal law, commercial law, constitutional law, administrative law, international law, human rights, social policy, public administration, tax law, labour law, European law
Methods & tech: legal analysis, case studies, comparative law, jurisprudence, socio‑legal research, legislative drafting
Affiliations & labs: departments: general theory of law, Roman law, constitutional law, criminal law, civil law, commercial law, labour and social security law, administrative law, international law, European law, social work; legal clinic
Typical outputs: legal commentaries, research articles, textbooks, legislative proposals, legal opinions, policy analyses

Name: Prehrambeno‑biotehnološki fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: food technology, biotechnology, nutrition, bioprocess engineering
Programs: Prehrambena tehnologija (undergraduate), Biotehnologija (undergraduate), Nutricionizam (undergraduate), Prehrambeno inženjerstvo (graduate), Upravljanje sigurnošću hrane (graduate), Nutricionizam (graduate), Molekularna biotehnologija (graduate), Bioprocesno inženjerstvo (graduate), specialist programmes in Quality and safety of food and Food management, doctoral programme in biotechnological/bioprocess engineering and nutrition
Research topics: development of new technological processes in food production, analytical methods for quality and safety control, nutrition and nutrigenomics, selection of biotechnologically significant microorganisms, production of biofuels and biochemicals from renewable resources, biotechnology in environmental protection, water resources, marine environments

Name: Prirodoslovno‑matematički fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: natural sciences, mathematics, physics, chemistry, biology, geosciences
Programs: Undergraduate programmes: Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Molecular Biology, Geography, Geology, Geophysics, Environmental Science; Master programmes: Applied Mathematics, Chemistry, Computer Science and Mathematics, Ecology and Conservation, Environmental Science, Experimental Biology, Financial and Business Mathematics, Geography, Geology, Geophysics, Mathematics, Mathematical Statistics, Mineralogy, Molecular Biology, Pure Mathematics, Physics, and multiple Master of Education programmes; Integrated teacher education programmes combining science subjects; doctoral programmes across disciplines
Research topics: seismology, astrophysics, quantum physics, experimental physics, theoretical physics, mathematics, statistics, climate science, ecology, conservation, molecular biology, genetics, microbiology, geochemistry, geology, mineralogy, petrology, geophysics, environmental science

Typical outputs: scientific publications, datasets, theses, educational materials, patents, software, instruments

Name: Rudarsko‑geološko‑naftni fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: mining engineering, geological engineering, petroleum engineering
Programs: Mining (undergraduate), Geological Engineering (undergraduate), Petroleum Mining (undergraduate), Mining (graduate), Geological Engineering (graduate), Geology (graduate), Petroleum Mining (graduate)
Research topics: resource extraction, geotechnics, hydrogeology, petroleum reservoir engineering, drilling technology, rock mechanics, mineral processing, environmental protection, waste management, circular economy

Name: Stomatološki fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: dental medicine, dentistry, oral health
Programs: Integrated Dental Medicine programme (6 years, 360 ECTS) in English leading to Doctor of Dental Medicine; modern curriculum introduced in 2017/2018 using digital methods (3D scanning, printing, CAD/CAM) with preclinical and clinical training
Research topics: oral health, dental materials, implantology, orthodontics, oral surgery, dental prosthetics, periodontology, endodontics, cariology
Methods & tech: CAD/CAM dentistry, digital 3D scanning, additive manufacturing, radiography, microscopy, clinical trials, dental simulation systems
Affiliations & labs: school's clinics for dentistry and oral surgery, preclinical laboratories, partnerships with European universities, digital dentistry labs
Typical outputs: dental research papers, new dental materials, treatment protocols, clinical case studies, patents, dental innovations
Keywords: dentistry, dental medicine, oral health, implantology, orthodontics, digital dentistry

Name: Tekstilno‑tehnološki fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: textile engineering, fashion design, clothing technology, materials science
Programs: Textile and Fashion Design (undergraduate, 6 semesters) with tracks Fashion Design and Textile Design; Textile and Fashion Design (graduate, 4 semesters) with tracks Fashion Design, Textile Design, Costume Design, Theory and Culture of Fashion; Textile, Clothing and Footwear Technology (professional undergraduate, 6 semesters) with majors: Clothing Technology, Footwear Design, Textile Technology – mechanical, Footwear Technology, Textile Technology – chemical; Textile Technology and Engineering (university undergraduate, 6 semesters) with majors: Projecting and Management of Textiles (PMT), Textile Chemistry Materials and Ecology (TKME), Clothing Engineering (OI), Industrial Design of Textiles and Clothing (IDTO); Textile Technology and Engineering (graduate, 4 semesters) with majors PMT, TKME, OI, Industrial Design of Textiles (IDT), Industrial Design of Clothing (IDO); Doctoral programme in Textile Science and Technology (6 semesters)
Research topics: textile materials, textile chemistry, sustainable fashion, textile technology, garment design, environmental impact of textiles, smart textiles, protective clothing, functional materials
Methods & tech: textile manufacturing, dyeing and finishing, materials testing, CAD/CAM for clothing, pattern design, sustainability assessment, 3D body scanning, computer simulations
Affiliations & labs: labs for textile chemistry, clothing engineering, eco‑design, materials testing, digital fashion studio; collaborations with textile and fashion industry
Typical outputs: garments, textiles, research articles, patents, sustainable products, fashion collections, design prototypes
Keywords: textiles, fashion design, textile engineering, clothing technology, sustainability, smart textiles

Name: Učiteljski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: teacher education, early childhood education, pedagogy, lifelong learning
Programs: Early and Preschool Education (undergraduate, 3 years, 180 ECTS) offered in Zagreb, Čakovec and Petrinja; Early and Preschool Education (graduate, 2 years, 120 ECTS) for regular or part‑time; Integrated Teacher Education (5 years, 300 ECTS) offered in Zagreb, Čakovec and Petrinja; Integrated Teacher Education with majors in English language, German language, Adult education (5 years, 300 ECTS); Postgraduate specialist programme 'Lifelong Learning' with modules 'Teaching and lifelong learning' and 'Kinesiological education in preschool and primary education' (2 years, 120 ECTS)
Research topics: pedagogy, early childhood development, inclusive education, curriculum development, language education, lifelong learning, didactics, educational technology
Methods & tech: educational research, play‑based learning, curriculum design, teacher training, educational technology, e‑learning, assessment methods
Affiliations & labs: early childhood education labs, teacher training schools, research centres for pedagogy and lifelong learning, collaborations with schools and kindergartens
Typical outputs: educational curricula, teacher training materials, research articles, educational policy recommendations, learning resources
Keywords: teacher education, early childhood, pedagogy, preschool education, lifelong learning, curriculum development

Name: Veterinarski fakultet (UNIZG)
Domain areas: veterinary medicine, animal health, biomedicine, public health
Programs: Integrated undergraduate and graduate study of Veterinary Medicine (6 years, 360 ECTS) adapted to EU Directive 2005/36/EC, emphasising practical clinical training at FVMUZ clinics and extramural work; Postgraduate university specialization studies: Pathology and Breeding of Domestic Carnivores; Theriogenology of domestic mammals; Laboratory Animals Breeding and Pathology; Internal diseases of domestic animals; Game Breeding and Pathology; Sanitation; Surgery, orthopaedics and ophthalmology with anaesthesiology; Hygiene and Technology of Foodstuffs of Animal Origin; Swine Production and Health Care; Microbiology and epizootiology; Exotic & Pet Animals Breeding and Pathology; Veterinary pathology; Animal welfare (each 2 years, 120 ECTS)
Research topics: pathology and breeding of domestic carnivores, theriogenology of domestic mammals, laboratory animals breeding and pathology, internal diseases of domestic animals, game breeding and pathology, sanitation and public health, surgery orthopaedics and ophthalmology, hygiene and technology of foodstuffs of animal origin, swine production and health care, microbiology and epizootiology, exotic and pet animals breeding and pathology, veterinary pathology, animal welfare
Methods & tech: clinical diagnostics, surgery, anaesthesiology, pathology, laboratory diagnostics, animal husbandry techniques, veterinary epidemiology, imaging techniques (X‑ray, ultrasound), molecular diagnostics
Affiliations & labs: FVMUZ clinics, university veterinary hospital, laboratories for internal diseases, animal reproduction, pathology, virology, bacteriology, parasitology, food safety; collaborations with external veterinary institutions
Typical outputs: clinical case studies, veterinary care guidelines, research publications, veterinary public health policies, vaccines, diagnostic protocols
Keywords: veterinary medicine, animal health, pathology, animal welfare, theriogenology, veterinary public health
